Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to reach Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Request Payment
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average waiting time before Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION after Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION cases
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Minimum time it takes Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION after Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time it takes Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to be followed by Payment Handled
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Total time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Average time for Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to transition to any subsequent activity
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Elapsed time between Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Time until Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION from the start of the case
Metric: The average of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to the end of the case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION to Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER to identify bottlenecks in rejection cases
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time for all activities to reach Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION from case start
Metric: The sum of the duration between the start of the case and activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION'
